mapper.sql: select empid,photoUrl, workno, empName, gender, firtorgname, teamAffiliated, employType, firstWorkDate, hireDate, mobile, EXT_COL_994, EXT_COL_951, EXT_COL_999, EXT_COL_974, cascadingJobGrade, other1, other2, birthDate, nation, idCardNo, politics, EXT_COL_998, nationality, hujiAddress, EXT_COL_934, hujiCity, nowAddr, lastEduDegree, highDegree, EXT_COL_935, marriage, fertilityStatus, corpEmail,terminationDate,isUpgrade from sys_emp_info

select empid,photoUrl, workno, empName, gender, firtorgname, teamAffiliated, employType, firstWorkDate, hireDate, mobile, EXT_COL_994, EXT_COL_951, EXT_COL_999, EXT_COL_974, cascadingJobGrade, birthDate, nation, idCardNo, politics, EXT_COL_998, nationality, hujiAddress, EXT_COL_934, hujiCity, nowAddr, lastEduDegree, highDegree, EXT_COL_935, marriage, fertilityStatus, corpEmail,terminationDate,isUpgrade from sys_emp_info
mapper.select:
and workno like concat('%', #{workno}, '%') and empName like concat('%', #{empName}, '%') and gender = #{gender} and firtorgname like concat('%', #{firtorgname}, '%') and teamAffiliated like concat('%', #{teamAffiliated}, '%') and employType like concat('%', #{employType}, '%') and instr(firstWorkDate,#{firstWorkDate}) and instr(hireDate,#{hireDate}) and mobile like concat('%', #{mobile}, '%') and instr(EXT_COL_994,#{EXT_COL_994}) and instr(EXT_COL_951,#{EXT_COL_951}) and instr(EXT_COL_999,#{EXT_COL_999}) and instr(EXT_COL_974,#{EXT_COL_974}) and instr(cascadingJobGrade,#{cascadingJobGrade})
and instr(birthDate,#{birthDate}) and instr(nation,#{nation}) and instr(idCardNo,#{idCardNo}) and instr(politics,#{politics}) and instr(EXT_COL_998,#{EXT_COL_998}) and instr(nationality,#{nationality}) and instr(hujiAddress,#{hujiAddress}) and instr(EXT_COL_934,#{EXT_COL_934}) and instr(hujiCity,#{hujiCity}) and instr(nowAddr,#{nowAddr}) and instr(lastEduDegree,#{lastEduDegree}) and instr(highDegree,#{highDegree}) and instr(EXT_COL_935,#{EXT_COL_935}) and instr(marriage,#{marriage}) and instr(fertilityStatus,#{fertilityStatus}) and instr(corpEmail,#{corpEmail}) and instr(terminationDate,#{terminationDate})
and isUpgrade=#{isUpgrade}
order by EXT_COL_974 desc,hireDate desc,terminationDate desc
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_emp_info
empid, photoUrl, workno, empName, gender, firtorgname, teamAffiliated, employType, firstWorkDate, hireDate, mobile, EXT_COL_994, EXT_COL_951, EXT_COL_999, EXT_COL_974, cascadingJobGrade, other1, other2, birthDate, nation, idCardNo, politics, EXT_COL_998, nationality, hujiAddress, EXT_COL_934, hujiCity, nowAddr, lastEduDegree, highDegree, EXT_COL_935, marriage, fertilityStatus, corpEmail, terminationDate,
#{empid}, #{photoUrl}, #{workno}, #{empName}, #{gender}, #{firtorgname}, #{teamAffiliated}, #{employType}, #{firstWorkDate}, #{hireDate}, #{mobile}, #{EXT_COL_994}, #{EXT_COL_951}, #{EXT_COL_999}, #{EXT_COL_974}, #{cascadingJobGrade}, #{other1}, #{other2}, #{birthDate}, #{nation}, #{idCardNo}, #{politics}, #{EXT_COL_998}, #{nationality}, #{hujiAddress}, #{EXT_COL_934}, #{hujiCity}, #{nowAddr}, #{lastEduDegree}, #{highDegree}, #{EXT_COL_935}, #{marriage}, #{fertilityStatus}, #{corpEmail}, #{terminationDate},
mapper.delete:
delete from sys_emp_info where empid in
#{empid}
mapper.update:
update sys_emp_info set isUpgrade='是' where workno in
#{item.workno}
